snippet.title: Death Howl - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🎴 Add Death Howl to your wishlist and play the demo on January 20th: http://re.11bits.com/o2b

Check out the latest game from The Outer Zone and 11 bit studios. Journey the sorrowful spirit world in a soulslike deck builder, #DeathHowl. Craft cards and claim powerful totems to defeat the woeful spirits lurking in the mystical lands. Unravel the tale of a grieving mother in her desperate attempt to defy death and bring back her son 🦌💔
